name: Ruined Worlds
description:
This was our first game jam!  This was a small game made in the game jam;  AI-Generated Jam #2: Lost Worlds. The object is to go around the world and read each rune to open the portal to get home eventually. There are a few bugs that we are aware of but didn't have time to finish.

The portal doesn't appear when you get to all runes sadly.

Credit:

Portal Texture - https://ruxar.itch.io/portal

Map Textures - https://cainos.itch.io/pixel-art-top-down-basic

Character Textures - https://pixivan.itch.io/red-sprite-4-directional-free-version/download/eyJleHBpcmVzIjoxNjc5NzA0OTk0LCJpZCI6MTc0MjE0NH0%3d.%2f2aK4p0De%2fhLUDYD1fZw1e0tfRo%3d

Background Music - https://mayragandra.itch.io/freeambientmusic
